name: Martin The Martian VS The Pirates Octopus from Outer Space
name_original: Martin The Martian VS The Pirates Octopus from Outer Space
description:
A classic 2D Shoot 'em up that puts the likeable Martin, the Martian in a battle against a band of space pirate octopuses. Three stages, four enemy variations and three stage bosses, plus collectable power ups.

Developed at Construc 3.

A game by Squash Studios: 

http://squashstudios.com.br/projects.html
